Shanghai stocks up on tech shares 
2019-09-10
Chinaâ€™s main equity indexes rose yesterday, led by technology shares.
At the close, the benchmark Shanghai Composite Index increased 0.84 percent to end at 3,024.74 points.
The Shenzhen Component Index rose 1.82 percent to 10,001.93 points and the blue-chip CSI300 index advanced 0.62 percent to finish at 3,995.75 points.

Technology shares surged, with 5G, domestic software, chips, cloud computing and domestic operating system all gaining.
